announcements.content:
Dear YDL-User,
 ***REMOVED*** The payment is based on TV-L E11.

announcements.title: ***REMOVED***
announcements.content:
Dear YDL-User,
 on 28 March 2019 in the period from 13:30 to 18:00 maintenance work on ISIS will take place. During this time ISIS cannot be used. Please set up any deadlines for submission or registration in such a way that they do not fall within the maintenance period.

announcements.title: ***REMOVED***
announcements.content:
Dear YDL-User,
 we have moved all courses of the winter semester 2018/2019 to the archive area, just like last semester. For this purpose, new categories 'WS18/19' have been created in the respective archive areas and the current courses have been moved there.
